title: Why is my team always feeders????
body:
Every game its the same, first time (insert champ here), haven't played in 6 months or i'm gonna try some new stupid meta (aka feed) and it always ends up with them feeding, no matter what I do its always feed feed and feed. Its also great that 90% of the games i'm put into are with toxic trash talking kids who just ruin whatever there is left of the team in the pre game lobby, and then go ahead and feed themselves and blame it on the rest of the team. To be honest i'm not even sure how they manage to op League of Legends.

Riot please do something about this

replies.body:
I got banned for 2 weeks (my fault… reformed), and when I got back I ran into constant feeders. Both sides, but generally on my team. Someone mentioned that after an absence from League, your MMR drops and you get paired with less skilled players. I carried myself out of this ELO hell, and eventually the feeders started to get less and less (or maybe I just carried more and more, and helped my team get fed… who knows).

I'm guessing maybe this has happened with you. We are in a region which isn't steeped in computer gaming at the fanatic and historic level of Asia or America, with higher levels of gamers playing console games, so in general I would say that we would have a higher proportion of toxic and less skilled players. Give it a few years. Might also be the time of day you play at. I find later at night I get better games, but after school hours or on weekends, I run into far more kids and feeders.

Ive played LOL for 3.5 years and pretty much play everyday so absence isnt a problem :). Yes i am in Bronze and i understand why i will usually get feeders, but the people are I play with are always always (no offense) brain damaged. They go 2v1 when they have like 100 hp pick a champ they have never played before or the worst one is when you get people who haven't played in months, its like and endless cycle of feed i cant escape from. I don't even try ranked as that's 10x worse and I only ever go down which gets me paired with more bad players :(. And not to forgot 90% turn super sayian toxic as soon as you do a tiny thing wrong.
Thought you meant you were absent from League for '6 months'.
